title: Appnexus Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the AppNexus adapter

placement_id.description: An ID which identifies this placement of the impression

inv_code.description: A code identifying the inventory of this placement.

member.description: An ID which identifies the member selling the impression.

items.description: A key with one or more values associated with it. These are used in buy-side segment targeting.

traffic_source_code.description: Specifies the third-party source of this impression.

reserve.description: The minimium acceptable bid, in CPM, using US Dollars

position.description: Specifies the ad unit as above or below the fold

use_pmt_rule.description: Boolean to signal AppNexus to apply the relevant payment rule

use_payment_rule.description: Deprecated, Boolean to signal AppNexus to apply the relevant payment rule. use_pmt_rule will get precedence over usePaymentRule.

generate_ad_pod_id.description: Boolean to signal AppNexus to add ad pod id to each request

private_sizes.description: Private sizes (ex: [{"w": 300, "h": 250},{...}]), experimental, may not be supported.

ext_inv_code.description: Specifies predefined value passed on the query string that can be used in reporting

external_imp_id.description: Unique identifier of an externally generated auction
